summary: These uncompressed textures improve the look of female body and face textures. Includes Dunmer and Breton faces without wrinkles.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]
[color=lightblue]Improved Female Skin Textures (by Volek)[/color][/size]


I started improving some face textures for a friend and i think they ended up pretty well so i continued and improved all female face and body textures (excluding Argonians and Khajiits). All textures are uncompressed, to enhance quality.

[color=lightblue]What i did:[/color]
* removed blocky look from body and faces (including eyes, ears, lips, and hands)
* reduced brow ridge of female Dunmer face
* removed wrinkles from Dunmer and Breton faces (so you don\'t have to play an old woman)
* removed shades from face texture that looked like a moustache
* reduced dirt on body and hand textures
* reduced specular map of body (i think it looks better, but it\'s a matter of taste. If you don\'t like the specular map, delete Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalebody_1_s.dds)

[color=lightblue]How to install:[/color]
* Locate your Skyrim folder, default is C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim or C:\\ProgramFiles(x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
* Open the zip file, extract the Data folder to your Skyrim folder 

Some people encountered a black body bug, if you find out what causes it, please write a comment or PM.

If you wanna use the textures in your mod, just give credit, no need to ask for permission.
author: Volek
